guest_checkin.title: Guest Check-in Procedure
steps: Greet guest warmly and verify identification
Confirm reservation details in the system
Process payment and security deposit if required
Program room key cards and test functionality
Explain hotel amenities and Wi-Fi access
Provide property map and emergency information
Escort guest to room if requested

room_cleaning.title: Standard Room Cleaning Protocol
steps: Knock and announce housekeeping before entering
Check room status and note any maintenance issues
Strip and replace all linens and towels
Clean and sanitize bathroom thoroughly
Vacuum carpets and mop hard surfaces
Dust all furniture and surfaces
Restock amenities and supplies
Final quality inspection before checkout

maintenance_request.title: Maintenance Request Processing
steps: Receive and log maintenance request in system
Assess urgency level (Emergency/High/Medium/Low)
Assign to appropriate maintenance technician
Notify guest of expected resolution timeframe
Complete repair and test functionality
Update system with completion status
Follow up with guest for satisfaction

guest_complaint.title: Guest Complaint Resolution
steps: Listen actively and empathetically to guest concerns
Document complaint details in guest profile
Apologize sincerely and take ownership
Investigate the issue thoroughly
Offer appropriate compensation or solution
Implement resolution promptly
Follow up to ensure guest satisfaction
Document outcome for future reference
